'''''Amanita aprica''''' is a species of [[fungus]] in the family [[Amanitaceae]]. Described as new to science in 2005, the species is found in the [[Pacific Northwest]] region of North America, where it grows in a [[mycorrhiza]]l association with [[Douglas-fir]] and [[pine]]s.<ref name=Tulloss2005/>
